body_html:
The cause is not long array. It seems to be the fact that torch.cat is not implemented for the torch.half datatype.

Reproducible on master as well:

import torch
a = torch.randn(2, 3).to(torch.half)
b = torch.randn(2, 3).to(torch.half)
torch.cat([a, b])  # throws error
body_text:
The cause is not long array. It seems to be the fact that torch.cat is not implemented for the torch.half datatype.
Reproducible on master as well:
import torch
a = torch.randn(2, 3).to(torch.half)
b = torch.randn(2, 3).to(torch.half)
torch.cat([a, b])  # throws error
body:
The cause is not long array. It seems to be the fact that `torch.cat` is not implemented for the `torch.half` datatype.

Reproducible on master as well:
```python
import torch
a = torch.randn(2, 3).to(torch.half)
b = torch.randn(2, 3).to(torch.half)
torch.cat([a, b])  # throws error
```
